title: Worlds Apart
synopsis: Three separate love stories of Greeks in relationships with foreigners are set against the backdrop of a socioeconomic crisis that affects them all.

title: Suntan
synopsis: On a small Greek isle, a lonely middle-aged doctor falls madly in love and becomes dangerously obsessed with a nubile summer vacationer half his age.

title: Short Fuse
synopsis: Strapped with explosives, a courier must avoid the police while solving a mystery involving his family, a criminal empire and his past as a lawyer.
